page.title: 20Biography-A day in my life
page.content: {A day in my life. 'I get up at about 9.00a.m.on a Saturday and then have a cup of coffee.Most Saturdays my brother goes to band practice after fighting with me.My mam,dad and me go to do boring shopping.I do not like shopping since I lost one of my best earrings! Nearly every Saturday we go to the 'Causey Arch'for lunch.I have scampi.When we get back from lunch I have an argument with my brother as to who has to clean out our hamsters cage.Some afternoons we go to a fete or a garden centre or maybe more boring shopping.When we get home we have tea and I stay up late.My favourite supper is pizza or curry rolls.I go to bed at 10.00p.m.My room is very messy-mum calls it the pigsty.I like to read until 11.00.' {Jill Harrison age 10
